TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DbFunctionAggregate extends System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAggregate

Docs.summary: Supports standard aggregate functions, such as MIN, MAX, AVG, SUM, and so on. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This aggregate type corresponds to the invocation of an aggregate function.
Aggregates are pseudo-expressions, and can only appear in the aggregates clause of a `GroupBy` expression.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this aggregate is a distinct aggregate.
Docs.value: if the aggregate is a distinct aggregate; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionAggregate.Distinct%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionAggregate> indicates whether the aggregate is distinct. Therefore, duplicates in the input arguments must be eliminated before the aggregate is computed.

Docs.summary: Gets the method metadata that specifies the aggregate function to invoke.
Docs.value: The method metadata that specifies the aggregate function to invoke.
